ProductRampSegment.name: ProductRampSegment
ProductRampSegment.description: Represents the ramp period within a ramp deal where terms, volumes, and other commitments change over time.

DurationType.description: The unit of time within which users can try the product for free.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date the product ramp segment was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date the product ramp segment was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the product ramp segment.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of the product ramp segment.

ProductId.description: The ID of the product associated with the product ramp segment.

ProductSellingModelId.description: The ID of the product selling model associated with the product ramp segment.

SegmentType.description: The time duration within the ramp deal where specific terms, volumes, and commitments are applied to the subscription product.

TrialDuration.description: The duration within which users can try the product for free.

ProductRampSegment.accessRules: Product Catalog Management must be enabled to access this object.
